name: SearchStripeCustomers
description:
Search and retrieve customer data from Stripe.

Use this tool to search for customers that have been previously created in Stripe using their Search Query Language. Note that search may not reflect the most recent updates instantly and may experience delays during outages. This tool is not available for use in India.

parameters.name: search_query_string
parameters.description: The search query string used to search for customers. Refer to Stripe's Search Query Language documentation for syntax and supported fields.

value_schema.description: The search query string. See [search query language](https://stripe.com/docs/search#search-query-language) and the list of supported [query fields for customers](https://stripe.com/docs/search#query-fields-for-customers).

parameters.name: expand_response_fields
parameters.description: A list of fields in the response that should be expanded. Provide the field names as strings.

value_schema.description: Specifies which fields in the response should be expanded.

parameters.name: customer_result_limit
parameters.description: Specifies the maximum number of customer records to return, between 1 and 100. Default is 10.

value_schema.description: A limit on the number of objects to be returned. Limit can range between 1 and 100, and the default is 10.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for paginating through results. Use 'next_page' from a previous response for subsequent results. Omit on the first call.

value_schema.description: A cursor for pagination across multiple pages of results. Don't include this parameter on the first call. Use the next_page value returned in a previous response to request subsequent results.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Stripe API.

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Specifies which fields in the response should be expanded.

value_schema.description: Specifies which fields in the response should be expanded.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: A limit on the number of objects to be returned. Limit can range between 1 and 100, and the default is 10.

value_schema.description: A limit on the number of objects to be returned. Limit can range between 1 and 100, and the default is 10.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: A cursor for pagination across multiple pages of results. Don't include this parameter on the first call. Use the next_page value returned in a previous response to request subsequent results.

value_schema.description: A cursor for pagination across multiple pages of results. Don't include this parameter on the first call. Use the next_page value returned in a previous response to request subsequent results.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The search query string. See [search query language](https://stripe.com/docs/search#search-query-language) and the list of supported [query fields for customers](https://stripe.com/docs/search#query-fields-for-customers).

value_schema.description: The search query string. See [search query language](https://stripe.com/docs/search#search-query-language) and the list of supported [query fields for customers](https://stripe.com/docs/search#query-fields-for-customers).
